body:
After scanning the source code, I found the mouseup and drag action defined in echarts, and cancel the setUnfixed action in drag function. Then the node still fixed after dragging. 
中文：查了下源码，找到了echarts中对于mouseup和drag事件的定义。取消了drag函数中的setUnfixed操作，实现了拖拽后顶点保持fixed的功能。 @pissang 希望能添加顶点fixed的接口。
this is the same problem. #9337

> 滚动条相关的代码呢？是Canvas区域超过屏幕区域的滚动吗？
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26211188/49157132-0584de00-f35a-11e8-84a3-4b587049ccd5.png)

在同一个div中，要实现的效果是滑动的时候，上下两部分和中间的折线图一起滑动的，现在发布到手机上测试的时候，只有上下可以滑动，中间的折线图没有滑动，在中间放置普通的div测试是可以滑动的，是不是canvas的层级太高了，应该怎么去规避这个问题呐？
如何合理地设置grid呢？我有张图是自动生成的，图例可能很多，也可能很少，如果设置固定的grid，当图例比较少时，有很大一片空白。
请问你的问题解决了吗
https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=line-stack
`window.resize = echart.resize`

It seems to me that your container has no adaptive width.Not the reason for echart
https://panteng.github.io/vue-echarts/

It satisfy my requirement, echarts do not support auto adjust space between legend and grid currently, so too many legend may overlapping with grid. One line displays too few information if using type scroll.

@wwwsoftwares You can refer to this example.

http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xrJXD6fWhl

Hi,

this is not the same. I saw this one. The difference is, that all y values refer to a common set of x values, which is not the case for the vega-lite example. I wonder if you can specify x and y together in the series arrays, not just the y values.

Meanwhile I managed to render a chart, by creating multiple series on the fly. However the problem I see is that I'm forced to transform a column base data set into multiple 2-dimensional arrays.

Ideally, it would be possible to purely specify a config, w/o data transformation. 

Can this be achieved with dimensions, where the third dimension is driving the color and creating a new line for each new entry in the 3rd dimension?

Fixed on ecomfe/echarts-doc@68d435b

Current, switching language on runtime has not been supported. 
Language can only be switched on build stage, as [this doc introduced](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/tutorial.html#Create%20Custom%20Build%20of%20ECharts):

```shell
node node_modules/echarts/build/build.js --lang en
```

And the pre-build artifacts of en version have been provided in `echarts/dist/xxx-en.js`.
ECharts 3 will not be upgraded. Try ECharts 4 please.

There is a event "updateAxisPointer".

```js
chart.on('updateAxisPointer', function (e) { ... });
```
The feature is under development: support image and SVG on geo coords.

这个问题翻下issues，存在很久了
Thanks for the update.

2018-11-30 ， today, i redo 'vue-cli-service serve'  ,I found the white is back. I used the Vue CLI 3 ,so I found a rule when I wanted to fix it .  In the same folder,I make the component's config to use the echart-gl  effect and  put the earth.jpg ,height.jpg and space.jpg. But when I put the three jpgs in the public , I redo the  'vue-cli-service serve',I found it fixed. I do nothing but copy the same-three-jpgs in the public folder........ What is joking is that , then I DELETE the three jpgs in the 'public folder'. It is alse run as well. So, the problem is when can the echarts-gl run as 2+2=4?
我是中国的民工啦，欢迎用中文交流，解决这个bug.

I suggested put the three jpgs in the Vue CLI3 in the public folder. And the config for the 'globe' as following:
environment: './space.jpg', //外部太空环境
baseTexture: './earth.jpg', //地球的纹理(这里用的山川河流)
heightTexture: './height.jpg', //地球的高度纹理
我也遇到了。希望能尽快修复
I've solved it creating two functions one only with myChart.clear and another for draw all the chart and allways first call de function wich clear the chart and after the ones for draw it.

我也有这个问题……
Is there a fix or workaround planned for this ?

Currently, in an axis whose `type` is `'value'`, the `axisPointer` can only snap to data point, rather than axis tick.

Could I know why do you intend to make `axisPointer` snap to axis tick (e.g., 1, 2, 3)?
If the scenario is reasonable, it can be added as a new feature ~

It might be difficult to implement it in ECharts 2.0.

But in ECharts 3/4, you can implement it by `scatter` series and `geo` coordinate system.

Could you please make the PR based on the master branch of the recent version of echarts?
It hard to merge it from the so early version.
@kang558 Sorry, it does not work on SVG Rendering.

Sorry, border-radius is supported in image.

> Could I know why do you intend to make `axisPointer` snap to axis tick (e.g., 1, 2, 3)?

I'm making a ranking chart. And since the ranking could only be an integer, there's no reason that the y-axis label of the axisPointer would be a floating number rather than an integer. That is what I am thinking. @100pah

http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#action.highlight
`seriesIndex` and `dataIndex` can set to `Array` type
```
myChart.dispatchAction({
    type: 'highlight',
    seriesIndex: [0],
    dataIndex: [0,1]
})
```

效果和这个类似  但是在普通的div中的情况下，是否有方法可以实现正常的滚动呐  您是否在小程序中也遇到了类似Canvas无法拖动的问题

前辈您好，我也遇到了同样的问题。
具体描述为：三屏的演示窗口，左右屏为echarts图表数据展示，同样的json数据（具体包含饼状图，柱状图，水球图），要求点击刷新左右屏按钮，重绘页面（要求特效动画）。不知道，有没有解决方式，尝试了在echarts.init（）前，dom.removeAttribute("_echarts_instance_");但是还是不会出现重绘动画
http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#title.textStyle.align 试试设置 `title.textStyle.align` 和 `verticalAlign` 为 `'middle'`

> 前辈您好，我也遇到了同样的问题。
> 具体描述为：三屏的演示窗口，左右屏为echarts图表数据展示，同样的json数据（具体包含饼状图，柱状图，水球图），要求点击刷新左右屏按钮，重绘页面（要求特效动画）。不知道，有没有解决方式，尝试了在echarts.init（）前，dom.removeAttribute("_echarts_instance_");但是还是不会出现重绘动画

```
echarts.init(document.getElementById('echarts')).dispose();//销毁前一个实例
var myEcharts = echarts.init(document.getElementById('echarts'));//构建下一个实例
```
最后这样解决了功能实现
